## Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load Functions

```{r}
source("simulation_functions.R")
```

## Run the simulation

### Generate empty simulation dataframe

```{r}
initial <- initial_times_and_conditions()
```

### Run the timesteps

```{r}
input2_enabled <- turn_input2_off_and_on(initial, 10, 60, cutoff_level = 0.0)
result <- run_euler(input2_enabled)
result[nrow(result),]
```

## Plot the result

```{r}
result %>%
  select(-input1, -input2) %>%
  pivot_longer(-t_minutes)
```
